# Tracking and Analytics Blocklist
# This file contains domains known for tracking user behavior
# Format: One domain per line, no protocol prefix
# Last updated: Auto-generated

# Analytics and data collection
analytics.google.com
google-analytics.com
googletagmanager.com
hotjar.com
mouseflow.com
fullstory.com
logrocket.com
mixpanel.com
segment.com
amplitude.com

# Social media tracking
facebook.com
connect.facebook.net
pixel.facebook.com
linkedin.com
twitter.com
pinterest.com
instagram.com

# Marketing and advertising tracking
hubspot.com
marketo.com
pardot.com
salesforce.com
mailchimp.com
constantcontact.com
aweber.com

# Third-party trackers
scorecardresearch.com
quantserve.com
comscore.com
alexa.com
similarweb.com
compete.com

# Behavioral analytics
crazy-egg.com
optimizely.com
unbounce.com
leadpages.com
clickfunnels.com

# Fingerprinting and device tracking
fingerprintjs.com
maxmind.com
ip-api.com
ipinfo.io
